name: Midnight Thunder
description: Midnight Thunder is a majestic horse known for its striking black coat and graceful movements. This horse is not only beautiful but also has a gentle and friendly temperament, making it perfect for riders of all experience levels.

name: Silver Blaze
description: Silver Blaze is a stunning horse with a shimmering silver coat that catches the light beautifully. This horse is renowned for its speed and agility, making it a favorite among riders who enjoy an exhilarating ride.

name: Stardust Whisper
description: Stardust Whisper is a charming horse with a coat that glistens like the night sky. Known for its calm demeanor and smooth gait, this horse offers a serene and enjoyable riding experience, perfect for leisurely rides.
